name: I Spy: Fantasy
overview: I Spy Fantasy is a riddle-solving game for ages 6-10, based on the popular book series by Jean Marzollo and Walter Wick. The game features 3 different fantasy locations with 18 different areas for riddles. The three locations include the Sand Castle, the Deep Blue Sea, and Outer Space. Each location has a mission for you: collect certain items by solving riddles in order to win. In space you need to find 6 fuel crystals to power your shuttle and get back home. In the medieval castle you need to free a princess guarded by a dragon by finding 6 keys and then make potion to defeat the beast. The underwater mission has you find 6 pages of a mermaid's book to locate hidden treasure.
